titleStmt.title: The original, nature, and immortality of the soul a poem : with an introduction concerning humane knowledge / written by Sir John Davies ... ; with a prefatory account concerning the author and poem.
Nosce teipsum
titleStmt.author: Davies, John, Sir, 1569-1626.
Tate, Nahum, 1652-1715.

notesStmt.note: Epistle dedicatory signed by the editor: N. Tate.
Originally published in 1599 with title: Nosce teipsum.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
